refnamediv.refpurpose: Get the current pitch-bend value for this channel.

refsect1.title: Description
refsect1.para: Get the current pitch-bend value for this channel.

refsect1.title: Initialization
refsect1.para: imin, imax (optional) -- set minimum and maximum limits on values obtained

refsect1.title: Performance
refsect1.para: Get the current pitch-bend value for this channel. Note that this access to pitch-bend data is independent of the MIDI pitch, enabling the value here to be used for any arbitrary purpose.

refsect1.title: Examples
refsect1.para:
